docs.title: SEO Deliverable Prompt Library
docs.text: Welcome to a production-ready prompt library designed to help SEO professionals generate client-ready deliverables for every phase of a website growth campaign.

docs.title: What this knowledge base includes
docs.text:
• End-to-end prompts across discovery, strategy, implementation, and reporting.
  • Reusable templates with placeholders for any niche, location, and business model.
  • Structured outputs that can be pasted directly into decks, proposals, briefs, and SOPs.
  • Tags for skill level and use case (beginner, advanced, technical, creative).

docs.title: Quick-start guide
docs.text:
1. Start in Getting Started and copy the customization framework.
  2. Move phase-by-phase in chronological order as you onboard a new client.
  3. Replace placeholders (e.g., [WEBSITE_URL], [INDUSTRY]) before running prompts.
  4. Ask your AI model to return outputs in markdown tables and executive summary format.
  5. Save outputs into your client workspace and iterate with follow-up prompts.

docs.title: Index of deliverables
docs.text: Phase Deliverables covered Discovery & Research Site audit, ranking baseline, content gaps, backlink profile, competitors, SERP features, keyword clusters Strategy & Planning SEO roadmap, priority matrix, resource plan, KPI framework, pillar strategy, editorial calendar Technical SEO Core Web Vitals, mobile UX, schema plan, crawlability/indexation, architecture, internal links On-Page Optimization Meta optimization, heading structure, image optimization, URL strategy, content refresh, featured snippets Content Creation Blog and landing page briefs, cluster planning, article generation, FAQ creation, local page content Off-Page SEO Link opportunities, outreach templates, guest post research, digital PR, local citations, broken-link campaigns Local SEO GBP optimization, local citations, reviews, local content and links Monitoring & Reporting Monthly reporting, ranking movement, traffic/conversion analysis, drop investigations, continuous improvements Specialized E-commerce, SaaS, enterprise, international SEO prompt packs

docs.title: Search tips
docs.text:
• Use quotes for exact phrases (e.g., "core web vitals").
  • Combine terms like technical + advanced to find implementation-heavy prompts.
  • Filter by prompt intent: audit, strategy, brief, report, optimization.

Tip: Start every new client project by running the Discovery prompts first, then use Strategy prompts to prioritize actions.

docs.title: Contributing Guide
docs.text: Thanks for helping expand this SEO prompt library.

docs.title: Contribution principles
docs.text:
• Keep prompts copy-paste ready.
  • Preserve the standard format:
  • Purpose
  • Client Value
  • Prompt
  • Expected Output Format
  • Example Usage
  • Follow-up Prompts
  • Tips for Best Results
  • Use placeholders to maintain reusability.
  • Add tags (beginner, advanced, technical, creative).
  • Reflect current (2024-2025) SEO best practices.

docs.title: Content quality checklist
docs.text:
1. Is the deliverable client-ready?
  2. Are recommendations actionable and prioritized?
  3. Are assumptions clearly stated?
  4. Is the prompt industry-agnostic with easy customization?
  5. Does it include measurable outcomes or KPIs?

docs.title: How to add a new prompt page
docs.text:
1. Add a new markdown file under the relevant phase directory.
  2. Insert the page into mkdocs.yml navigation.
  3. Validate markdown formatting and heading levels.
  4. Run local build checks before opening a PR.

docs.title: How to Customize Prompts for Specific Clients
1) Business context layer
docs.text:
• Business type: lead gen, ecommerce, SaaS, publisher, marketplace.
  • Revenue levers: form fills, demos, subscriptions, transactions.
  • Sales cycle length and funnel complexity.

docs.title: 2) Audience layer
docs.text:
• Segment by awareness stage and search intent.
  • Add pain points, objections, and decision criteria.
  • Include user sophistication and terminology.

docs.title: 3) Market layer
docs.text:
• Geography (local, national, international).
  • Competitive density and SERP volatility.
  • Regulatory/compliance constraints.

docs.title: 4) SEO maturity layer
docs.text:
• Existing content quality and depth.
  • Technical debt profile.
  • Historical link authority and brand visibility.

docs.title: Customization template (copy/paste)
docs.text:
Before generating the deliverable, adapt your recommendations to:
- Business model: [BUSINESS_MODEL]
- Revenue goal: [REVENUE_GOAL]
- Audience segments: [AUDIENCE_SEGMENTS]
- Geography: [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION]
- SEO maturity: [SEO_MATURITY_LEVEL]
- Key constraints: [BUDGET_TIMELINE_CONSTRAINTS]
- Brand voice: [BRAND_VOICE]

Prioritize recommendations by impact, effort, and time-to-result.

docs.title: Tags
docs.text: beginner advanced technical creative

docs.title: Understanding Deliverable Formats
docs.text: Use these standardized formats to keep outputs client-ready.

docs.title: Recommended format blocks
docs.text:
1. Executive Summary (5-10 bullets)
  2. Current State / Baseline
  3. Opportunity Areas
  4. Prioritized Recommendations
  5. Implementation Plan (30/60/90 day)
  6. KPIs and Reporting Cadence
  7. Risks, Dependencies, and Assumptions

docs.title: Output format request snippet
docs.text:
Return the response as:
1) Executive summary
2) Findings table (Issue, Impact, Evidence, Priority)
3) Action plan table (Task, Owner, Effort, ETA)
4) KPI dashboard definitions
5) Stakeholder-ready next steps

docs.title: Introduction to Using This Prompt Library
docs.text: This library is built for agencies, in-house SEO teams, and consultants who need fast, high-quality deliverables.

docs.title: Workflow by project stage
docs.text:
1. Discovery: Establish baseline performance and opportunities.
  2. Strategy: Turn findings into a prioritized roadmap.
  3. Execution: Deploy technical, on-page, content, and off-page initiatives.
  4. Measurement: Track impact and continuously optimize.

docs.title: Prompt execution best practices
docs.text:
• Provide accurate context: business model, target audience, top competitors, and geography.
  • Ask the AI to cite assumptions and confidence levels.
  • Request output in sections: Executive Summary, Findings, Recommendations, Next Actions.
  • Keep an internal QA checklist to verify facts before client delivery.

docs.title: Required placeholder set
docs.text:
Use these placeholders in every prompt unless not applicable:

  • [WEBSITE_URL]
  • [INDUSTRY]
  • [TARGET_AUDIENCE]
  • [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION]
  • [COMPETITOR_URLS]
  • [PRIMARY_GOALS]
  • [ANALYTICS_NOTES]

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Identify true SEO competitors and compare visibility by topic cluster.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Refocuses strategy around competitors actually winning SERPs, not just business competitors.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Identify the top SEO competitors for [WEBSITE_URL] in [INDUSTRY] for [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION].
Compare visibility, ranking footprint, and keyword overlap.

Deliver:
- Competitor shortlist (primary, secondary, emerging)
- Share-of-voice estimate by topic cluster
- Top pages driving competitor traffic
- Terms where [WEBSITE_URL] is within striking distance (positions 4-20)

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text:
Competitor matrix + opportunity list with priorities.

Tags: beginner advanced

docs.title: Competitor Content + Backlink + SERP Feature Analysis
Purpose
docs.text: Reverse-engineer competitor content depth, link acquisition, and SERP feature capture.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Improves win rate by adapting proven tactics to your brand context.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Perform a deep competitor SEO analysis for [COMPETITOR_URLS] against [WEBSITE_URL].

Include:
1) Content strategy analysis
- Pillars, clusters, update cadence, format mix
2) Backlink strategy analysis
- Link source patterns, anchor text themes, referring domain quality
3) SERP feature analysis
- Featured snippets, PAA, local pack, image/video, FAQ rich results

Output actionable recommendations prioritized by impact/effort.

docs.title: Example Usage
docs.text: [WEBSITE_URL]=https://example-saas.com and 3-5 direct search competitors.

docs.title: Follow-up Prompts
docs.text:
• "Translate this into a 90-day anti-competitive action plan."

Tags: advanced technical

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Generate a complete technical SEO audit for [WEBSITE_URL], including crawlability, indexation, performance, and architecture issues.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Creates an implementation-ready issue backlog that reduces ranking risk and unlocks growth.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Act as a senior technical SEO consultant. Build a full technical SEO audit for [WEBSITE_URL] in [INDUSTRY] targeting [TARGET_AUDIENCE] in [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION].

Include:
- Crawlability and indexation checks (robots.txt, XML sitemap, canonical, noindex, redirect chains)
- Page speed and Core Web Vitals priorities
- Mobile usability issues
- Site architecture and internal linking risks
- Structured data opportunities
- Duplicate content and URL parameter risks

Provide:
1) Executive summary
2) Findings table with severity (Critical/High/Medium/Low)
3) Prioritized 30/60/90 day remediation plan
4) KPI impact estimate per recommendation
5) Stakeholder summary for non-technical leadership

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Audit report with severity scoring, implementation roadmap, and KPI impact model.

docs.title: Example Usage
docs.text: Use placeholders: [WEBSITE_URL]=https://www.acmehvac.com, [INDUSTRY]=Home Services, [TARGET_AUDIENCE]=Homeowners in suburban markets.

docs.title: Follow-up Prompts
docs.text:
• "Convert the critical items into Jira tickets with acceptance criteria."
  • "Create QA test cases for each fix."

docs.title: Tips for Best Results
docs.text:
Provide GSC and analytics exports for higher-confidence recommendations.

Tags: technical advanced

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Map current content coverage and identify missing high-value topics.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Helps allocate content investment toward topics with measurable traffic/conversion potential.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
You are an SEO content strategist. Analyze [WEBSITE_URL] and produce a content inventory + gap analysis for [INDUSTRY].

Inputs:
- Current sitemap/pages
- Top competitors: [COMPETITOR_URLS]
- Audience: [TARGET_AUDIENCE]
- Goals: [PRIMARY_GOALS]

Output:
- Content inventory by page type and intent
- Gap matrix by funnel stage
- Topic opportunities with estimated traffic potential
- Priority scoring: Business Impact x Ranking Difficulty x Content Effort
- 12-week execution plan

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Inventory table + gap matrix + prioritized content roadmap.

docs.title: Example Usage
docs.text: [COMPETITOR_URLS]=competitorA.com, competitorB.com, competitorC.com.

docs.title: Tips for Best Results
docs.text:
Provide existing content performance by clicks, impressions, and assisted conversions.

Tags: beginner creative

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Establish a benchmark for rankings, visibility, and authority.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Creates a measurable “before” snapshot for quarterly SEO impact reporting.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Build a baseline SEO benchmark for [WEBSITE_URL].

Include:
- Current ranking distribution by position buckets (1-3, 4-10, 11-20, 21-50)
- Keyword intent mix and non-brand vs brand split
- Backlink profile quality assessment (authority, relevance, toxicity risk)
- Competitor overlap and missed opportunity terms
- 10 key benchmark KPIs with definitions and data sources

Present findings for executive and practitioner audiences.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Benchmark dashboard definitions + annotated narrative.

docs.title: Follow-up Prompts
docs.text:
• "Create a monthly template to track movement against this baseline."

Tags: advanced technical

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Generate a full keyword universe spanning commercial, informational, and navigational intent.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Enables precise targeting of terms most likely to drive qualified traffic and revenue.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create a keyword research deliverable for [WEBSITE_URL] in [INDUSTRY].

Include sections:
1) Primary commercial-intent keywords (high volume)
2) Long-tail opportunities by problem/use case
3) Semantic keyword clusters by topic entity
4) Keyword difficulty vs opportunity scoring model
5) Local SEO keyword variants for [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION]
6) Question-based keywords for PAA/FAQ capture

For each keyword include: intent, estimated volume tier, competition tier, funnel stage, priority score, recommended page type.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Master keyword table + cluster map + implementation recommendations.

docs.title: Example Usage
docs.text: [INDUSTRY]=B2B payroll software, [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION]=United States.

docs.title: Follow-up Prompts
docs.text:
• "Map this keyword set to existing pages and identify cannibalization risks."
  • "Create 20 title/H1 options for the top 5 clusters."

docs.title: Tips for Best Results
docs.text:
Ask for confidence levels and assumptions where external tools are not available.

Tags: beginner advanced creative

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Define scalable content architecture aligned with search intent and funnel needs.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Builds topical authority while connecting content to conversion journeys.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create a content strategy for [WEBSITE_URL] in [INDUSTRY].

Include:
- Content pillar and cluster architecture
- Editorial calendar for 6 months
- Content gap and opportunity map
- Optimization prioritization for existing pages
- Internal linking blueprint across clusters
- KPI model (traffic, engagement, assisted conversions)

Provide recommendations by funnel stage and audience segment.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Content strategy document + monthly publishing calendar.

docs.title: Tips for Best Results
docs.text:
Add SME availability constraints and publishing capacity inputs.

Tags: creative advanced

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Transform research into a strategic plan aligned to business outcomes.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Gives stakeholders a clear path from SEO investment to revenue impact.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Act as an SEO director. Create a comprehensive SEO strategy for [WEBSITE_URL].

Context:
- Industry: [INDUSTRY]
- Audience: [TARGET_AUDIENCE]
- Geography: [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION]
- Business goals: [PRIMARY_GOALS]
- Key competitors: [COMPETITOR_URLS]

Deliver:
1) Strategic objectives tied to business outcomes
2) Priority matrix (quick wins vs long-term initiatives)
3) Resource allocation (roles, capacity, dependencies)
4) 6-month timeline by workstream
5) KPI framework with leading and lagging indicators
6) Risk register and mitigation strategies

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Executive strategy brief + operational implementation plan.

docs.title: Example Usage
docs.text: Use this as the main deck backbone for stakeholder kickoff.

docs.title: Follow-up Prompts
docs.text:
• "Convert the roadmap into weekly sprint plans."
  • "Produce executive one-page version."

Tags: advanced technical

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Create a prioritized performance roadmap for improving speed and UX signals.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Faster sites improve conversion rates and reduce ranking friction.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Audit [WEBSITE_URL] and produce a site speed optimization plan.
Analyze server response, caching, render-blocking resources, JS/CSS payload, image delivery, and CDN usage.
Map recommendations to Core Web Vitals impact (LCP, INP, CLS) with effort estimates.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Issue table + implementation order + KPI targets.

docs.title: Example Usage
docs.text: [WEBSITE_URL]=https://www.example.com

docs.title: Tips for Best Results
docs.text: Provide page-template level test data from mobile and desktop.

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Evaluate mobile UX issues affecting rankings and conversions.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Improves engagement and form completion on mobile traffic.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Perform a mobile usability audit for [WEBSITE_URL].
Review viewport setup, tap targets, font legibility, intrusive popups, navigation friction, and mobile conversion blockers.
Prioritize fixes by user impact and implementation effort.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Usability findings with severity and remediation plan.

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Define structured data opportunities across templates.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Supports rich results and improved SERP visibility.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create a schema implementation roadmap for [WEBSITE_URL].
Recommend schema by template: Organization, Product/Service, Article, FAQ, LocalBusiness, Breadcrumb, Review, Video.
Provide JSON-LD examples and validation/testing workflow.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Template-by-template schema matrix + JSON-LD examples.

docs.title: Site Architecture and Internal Linking Strategy
Purpose
docs.text: Optimize crawl paths and authority flow across core pages.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Improves indexation and ranking potential for money pages.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Analyze the site architecture of [WEBSITE_URL] and design an internal linking strategy.
Include crawl depth, orphan-page recovery, hub-and-spoke models, anchor text guidance, and link equity flow improvements.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Architecture map recommendations + internal linking backlog.

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Identify indexing blockers and crawl inefficiencies.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Ensures strategic pages are discoverable, indexable, and consolidated.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Run a crawlability/indexation analysis for [WEBSITE_URL].
Check robots directives, XML sitemaps, canonicals, noindex usage, redirect chains, duplicate URLs, and parameter handling.
Return critical issues first with implementation sequencing.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Crawl/indexation issue log with severity and owner.

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Deliver a focused CWV recovery plan.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Supports long-term technical stability and search performance.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Build a Core Web Vitals improvement plan for [WEBSITE_URL] by template and device class.
Set target thresholds, identify root causes, and provide phased fixes with QA criteria.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text:
CWV scorecard + 30/60/90 day engineering plan.

Tags: technical advanced

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Audit existing content on [WEBSITE_URL] and identify pages to optimize first based on traffic potential, ranking positions, and conversion value.
Return a prioritized optimization backlog.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: For [LIST_OF_URLS], recommend content refresh actions: outdated sections, missing subtopics, weak E-E-A-T signals, thin sections, outdated stats, and schema enhancements.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Develop an E-E-A-T enhancement plan for [WEBSITE_URL], including author credibility, sourcing quality, trust pages, editorial standards, and review workflows.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Identify snippet opportunities for [WEBSITE_URL] and recommend formatting patterns (definitions, lists, tables, Q&A blocks) per keyword cluster.

Tags: advanced creative

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Increase SERP CTR while preserving relevance.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: More clicks from existing rankings without new content production.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Optimize titles and meta descriptions for top [NUMBER_OF_PAGES] pages on [WEBSITE_URL].
For each page include current issues, improved title/description, target keyword, and CTR rationale.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Before/after metadata table.

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Improve semantic structure and intent matching.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Review heading structure for [PAGE_URLS].
Recommend H1-H6 revisions that improve clarity, keyword alignment, and scannability.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Generate image SEO recommendations for [PAGE_URLS]: filenames, alt text quality, compression opportunities, and next-gen formats.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Audit URL structures on [WEBSITE_URL].
Provide SEO-friendly URL conventions, canonicalization notes, and redirect mapping considerations.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create internal linking suggestions for [WEBSITE_URL] with source URL, target URL, anchor text, intent, and priority.

Tags: beginner technical

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create an SEO blog brief for keyword cluster [KEYWORD_CLUSTER].
Include search intent, target persona, SERP analysis, outline, PAA questions, internal links, external references, CTA strategy, and quality checklist.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Generate a landing page SEO brief for [SERVICE_OR_PRODUCT] targeting [TARGET_KEYWORD] in [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION].
Include conversion goals, trust elements, section-by-section guidance, schema recommendations, and CRO notes.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Build an optimization brief for [PAGE_URL] with semantic entities, required subsections, FAQs, comparison content, and conversion-focused copy recommendations.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Plan a topic cluster for [PILLAR_TOPIC] with one pillar page and [N] supporting articles.
Provide interlinking map, publishing sequence, and KPI expectations.

Tags: creative beginner

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Write an SEO-optimized article for [TARGET_KEYWORD] tailored to [TARGET_AUDIENCE].
Requirements:
- Demonstrate first-hand expertise where possible
- Include clear structure with H2/H3 hierarchy
- Integrate semantic variations naturally
- Add FAQ section and schema-ready Q&A
- Include internal link placeholders and conversion CTA

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Generate an FAQ section for [PAGE_TOPIC] focused on high-intent questions from [TARGET_AUDIENCE] in [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION].
Return concise, trust-building answers with schema-ready formatting.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Optimize product descriptions for [PRODUCT_CATEGORY] to improve search visibility and conversion.
Include benefit-driven copy, differentiators, semantic keywords, and objection handling.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create local landing page content for [SERVICE] in [CITY/REGION].
Include local proof points, service area specificity, trust signals, FAQs, and location-specific intent alignment.

Tags: creative advanced

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Identify link building opportunities for [WEBSITE_URL] in [INDUSTRY].
Categorize by digital PR, resource pages, partnerships, directories, niche communities, and competitor link gaps.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create outreach email templates for link building campaigns:
1) Guest post pitch
2) Resource page inclusion
3) Broken link replacement
4) Digital PR collaboration
Tailor tone to [BRAND_VOICE] and [TARGET_AUDIENCE].

docs.title: Guest Post Research + Digital PR Angles
Prompt
docs.text:
Research guest post opportunities and digital PR story angles for [WEBSITE_URL].
Provide relevance scoring, estimated authority tier, outreach notes, and editorial fit rationale.

docs.title: Local Citation + Broken Link Building Plan
Prompt
docs.text:
Develop a plan for local citation building and broken-link outreach for [WEBSITE_URL] in [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION].
Include prospecting workflow, qualification criteria, outreach cadence, and reporting KPIs.

Tags: advanced creative

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Create a Google Business Profile optimization plan for [BUSINESS_NAME] in [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION].
Include category selection, service descriptions, photo strategy, post cadence, Q&A, and review response templates.

docs.title: Local Citation Audit and Build Plan
Prompt
docs.text:
Audit existing local citations for [BUSINESS_NAME] and produce a citation cleanup + expansion plan.
Include NAP consistency checks, duplicate suppression, and priority directory list.

docs.title: Local Content + Review Strategy + Local Links
Prompt
docs.text:
Build a local SEO strategy covering:
- Local content themes by neighborhood/service
- Review generation and management workflow
- Local partnership and sponsorship link opportunities
for [WEBSITE_URL] in [GEOGRAPHIC_LOCATION].

Tags: beginner advanced

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Identify underperforming pages on [WEBSITE_URL] and diagnose root causes (intent mismatch, weak topical coverage, poor UX, thin authority signals).
Provide page-specific optimization actions.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Investigate ranking drops for [WEBSITE_URL] over [DATE_RANGE].
Assess algorithm volatility, technical changes, content updates, backlink shifts, and SERP competition changes.
Return a hypothesis-ranked root cause analysis.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Assess how recent Google algorithm updates may impact [WEBSITE_URL] in [INDUSTRY].
Map risk areas and produce a mitigation + recovery plan.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Design a quarterly SEO continuous-improvement program for [WEBSITE_URL], including experimentation roadmap, KPI guardrails, and iterative optimization loops.

Tags: advanced technical

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Summarize SEO impact and next actions for stakeholders.

docs.title: Client Value
docs.text: Improves accountability and keeps execution aligned to business outcomes.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Generate a monthly SEO report for [WEBSITE_URL].
Include: KPI dashboard, ranking movements, traffic/conversion changes, backlink growth, competitor shifts, wins/losses, and next-month priorities.

docs.title: Expected Output Format
docs.text: Executive summary + analyst appendix + action plan.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Analyze ranking movements by keyword cluster over [DATE_RANGE].
Highlight major gains/drops, likely causes, and corrective actions.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Evaluate organic traffic quality for [WEBSITE_URL], including landing-page performance, assisted conversions, intent alignment, and funnel leakage.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Create a backlink growth report for [WEBSITE_URL] showing referring domain trends, authority quality, anchor text mix, and risk flags.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Produce a competitive positioning report comparing [WEBSITE_URL] vs [COMPETITOR_URLS] by topic visibility, share-of-voice trends, and strategic opportunities.

Tags: beginner technical

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Create an e-commerce SEO strategy for [WEBSITE_URL], including category architecture, faceted navigation controls, product page schema, merchant feed alignment, and transactional keyword targeting.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Create a SaaS SEO strategy for [WEBSITE_URL] with feature-led pages, use-case pages, integration pages, comparison pages, and BOFU content mapped to pipeline goals.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text: Develop an enterprise SEO operating model for [WEBSITE_URL]: governance, stakeholder workflows, scalable QA, internationalization constraints, and change-management SOPs.

docs.title: Prompt
docs.text:
Build an international SEO strategy for [WEBSITE_URL], covering market selection, hreflang implementation, localization workflow, regional keyword strategy, and country-folder/subdomain architecture tradeoffs.

Tags: advanced technical creative
